name: SimStim Struggle
body:
#### Visit the following wiki pages to learn more about the project...

* [Game Evaluation](https://github.com/justintweaver/mtchi-cert-game/wiki/Game-Evaluation)

#### Visit and try a running instance of the project on Heroku...

[SimStim Struggle](http://makahiki-mtc.herokuapp.com/)
